title: He was born without a hand — so his classmates built one for him
description: Sergio Peralta, a sophomore at a Tennessee high school, received a prosthetic hand built by his engineering classmates.

title: One of Tesla’s biggest critics is funding a Super Bowl ad against it
description: Dan O'Dowd has spent millions publicizing mistakes made by Tesla's Full Self-Driving tech. Now he's doubling down with a Super Bowl ad aimed at politicians.
